meanings.definition: The act of embracing or holding someone or something closely.
meanings.sent1: She gave her friend a warm embracement when they reunited.
meanings.sent2: The mother's embracement of her child showed her love and care.
meanings.sent3: The teddy bear's embracement of the blanket made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The tree's embracement of the vine created a beautiful natural sculpture.
meanings.sent5: The puppy's embracement of the toy was adorable to watch.

meanings.definition: The state of being embraced or held closely.
meanings.sent1: The baby slept peacefully in the embracement of her mother.
meanings.sent2: Feeling safe and loved in the embracement of family is priceless.
meanings.sent3: The cat's embracement of the sunbeam made it the happiest feline around.
meanings.sent4: The mountain range's embracement of the valley was breathtaking from above.
meanings.sent5: The warm embracement of the fireplace on a cold night was comforting.

meanings.definition: Acceptance or support of an idea or belief.
meanings.sent1: The embracement of new technology has improved our lives.
meanings.sent2: The community's embracement of diversity makes it a welcoming place for all.
meanings.sent3: The embracement of the crazy idea turned out to be a stroke of genius.
meanings.sent4: His embracement of change led to exciting opportunities he never imagined.
meanings.sent5: The embracement of kindness can make a big difference in someone's day.
